title: Hamas' Abu Obaida Speaks On Houthis Capturing 'Israeli' Ship As Yemenis Dance On Vessel To Taunt IDF
description:
Days after the Houthis of Yemen seized a cargo ship in the Red Sea, the spokesperson of Hamas' military wing Al Qassam Brigades spoke on the incident. Abu Obaida thanked "brothers in Yemen" for supporting Gaza amid the war with Israel which was sparked by Hamas' surprise attack on Israel. Meanwhile, the Houthis released a video which showed Yemenis dancing on the top deck of the ship named 'Galaxy Leader'. While the Houthis claim that the ship is Israeli, the Benjamin Netanyahu government has contested this while condemning the incident. Watch the full video for more.

description:

title: Abu Obaida assassination rumors "part of Israeli psychological war", says Hamas
description:
Security forces of the Palestinian resistance have cautioned the public against recent 'Israeli' claims suggesting that Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, had been assassinated in Gaza.

According to the resistance, these rumors are part of a deliberate 'Israeli' campaign designed to serve intelligence and psychological objectives.

The statement highlighted that 'Israeli' media is heavily controlled by the military and intelligence agencies, and nothing is published without prior security approval. Past incidents have shown that 'Israel' often spreads false reports about targeted leaders to manipulate their behavior, gather intelligence, and prepare for potential operations.

The resistance warned that such misinformation is part of a broader psychological warfare effort intended to destabilize internal morale and create confusion within Gaza.

Citizens were urged not to circulate these claims, emphasizing that these rumors are aimed at weakening public confidence and undermining the unity of the Palestinian front.

title: Abu Obaida delivers first speech since ceasefire
description:
"This could have been achieved a year ago if it suited Netanyahu."

Abu Obaida, the spokesman for Al-Qassam Brigades, Hamas' military wing, delivered a speech after the ceasefire went into effect in Gaza on Sunday morning.

In his address, Abu Obaida confirmed Hamas' commitment to the ceasefire and called on international mediators to ensure Israel abided by the agreement.

He also blamed Israel's government for delaying its agreement to a ceasefire for months, and thanked armed groups across the region for their solidarity with Gaza.

Lastly, he assured Palestinians in Gaza that this was a time for rebuilding and unity as they recover from the immense destruction of Israel's war on the strip and look to the future.

title: Hamas is still committed to truce says Qassam Brigades spokesperson
description:
Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for the Qassam Brigades - Hamas's military wing - said on Thursday that should Israel return to war in Gaza, it will risk the lives of the remaining living captives.

In a 12-minute video posted to Telegram, Abu Obeida said that Hamas says is still committed to abiding by a ceasefire deal.

"Despite all the enemy's attempts at evasion, lies and deception, we preferred and still prefer to adhere to the agreement in order to spare the blood of our people," he added.

title: Juru Bicara Al Qassam Abu Obeida Minta Jemaah Haji yang Wukuf di Arafah untuk Doakan Palestina
description:
TRIBUN-VIDEO.COM - Juru bicara militer Brigade Al-Qassam, Abu Obeida mengirimkan pesan ke jutaan umat muslim yang tengah menjalankan wukuf di Arafah dalam ibadah haji.

Dalam pesannya, Abu Obeida meminta agar para jamaah yang sedang berwukuf untuk berdoa bagi Gaza dan Palestina.

"Kami mengimbau â€œpara peziarah Rumah Suci Allah untuk mengenang saudara-saudara mereka di Gaza dan Palestina dengan doa tulus mereka di tempat-tempat suci dan selama ritual haji,â€ katanya dalam sebuah pernyataan yang dilansir Khaberni, Sabtu.

Abu Obeida memohon agar di waktu yang mustajab, doa-doa dihaturkan untuk perjuangan Gaza melawan Israel.

Seperti diketahui pada Sabtu (15/6/2024) seluruh jemaah haji melaksanakan wukuf di Padang Arafah.

Prosesi haji 1445 H akan memasuki puncaknya.

Momen wukuf bagi jemaah haji ini begitu sakral.

Sebab di fase inilah, para jemaah haji diajak untuk berkomunikasi langsung dengan Sang Pencipta di waktu dan tempat yang mustajab.(Tribun-Video.Com)

title: Israel pushes tanks further into Gaza city after Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida killed | BBC News
description:
Israel has pushed tanks further into Gaza City and detonated vehicles containing explosives, according to witnesses there. 

At least 98 people have been killed in Israel's continued bombardment of Gaza in the last 24 hours, according to health officials in the territory. 

Israel has said Abu Obeida, the spokesman for Hamas's armed wing, has been killed in an aerial attack in Gaza City.

Israel's Defence Minister Israel Katz congratulated the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) and Israel's security agency, Shin Bet, for the "flawless execution" in a post on X.

Hamas has not confirmed his death. The Palestinian armed group earlier said dozens of civilians were killed and injured in the Israeli air strikes on a residential building in the district.

title: Uncertainty surrounds Qassam's spokesperson Abu Obaida as rumors of injury or death surge online
description:
Amid rapid developments following the Gaza ceasefire, uncertainty has returned over the fate of Al-Qassam Brigadesâ€™ military spokesperson, Abu Obaida. His prolonged absence has sparked a storm of rumors and speculation across social media platforms.

Over the past 24 hours, the X platform (formerly Twitter) has seen a surge of Arabic posts exceeding 50,000 interactions. Reports have ranged from claims of â€œserious injuryâ€ following an assassination attempt to unconfirmed statements of his safety, turning Abu Obaidaâ€™s status into a heated topic and a psychological battleground online.

Rumors Surge: â€œSeverely Injuredâ€ or â€œConfirmed Martyrdomâ€?
The rumors intensified on Tuesday evening, with posts claiming to convey a â€œmessage from an Al-Qassam leaderâ€ stating that Abu Obaida had sustained a â€œserious injury from an attackâ€ but was â€œunder specialized medical care and in stable condition,â€ adding that the assassination attempt had failed. These claims were widely circulated and accompanied by prayers for his recovery.

Meanwhile, other voices suggested that he may have been martyred, arguing that his weeks-long absence is the strongest indicator. Activists cautioned against falling for what they described as a â€œpsychological warfareâ€ tactic by 'Israel', urging the public to wait for an official statement.

Concern, Prayers, and Faith in the Resistance
The conflicting rumors have sparked widespread concern and prayers across Arab and Palestinian communities. X has been flooded with posts asking for Abu Obaidaâ€™s safety, while others shared clips of his previous speeches, emphasizing his symbolic importance.

At the same time, many expressed confidence in his survival, viewing the silence from the resistance as a deliberate tactic. One user wrote, â€œThe mistake of revealing resistance leaders during the truce wonâ€™t be repeated. God willing, Abu Obaida is alive, and when the war officially ends, he will deliver the victory speech at the Saraya Square in Gaza.â€

Digital Battlefield: Psychological Warfare Online
Analysts say the past 24 hours illustrate a new chapter in the psychological warfare between Hamas and 'Israel'. In the absence of official information, digital platforms have become a key battleground where each side seeks to shape narratives and influence public morale.

On one hand, 'Israel' reportedly spreads rumors of assassination or injury to sow doubt and demoralize supporters of Hamas. On the other, Hamas follows a â€œstrategic ambiguityâ€ approach, letting silence generate speculation and maintaining the initiative in the psychological arena. In this information vacuum, Abu Obaidaâ€™s fate remains unknown, yet he continues to symbolize steadfastness in the eyes of those who support him.

Historical Context: The Green Symbol of Resistance
Abu Obaida, the nom de guerre of Al-Qassamâ€™s military spokesperson, became the most prominent media face of the resistance after announcing Operation Aqsa Typhoon on October 7, 2023.

He is known for speeches that combine warnings to 'Israel' with messages of hope for supporters of the resistance. This role has made him a primary target, with 'Israel' claiming in August 2025 that he had been killed in an airstrike, a claim never officially confirmed by Hamas. His continued absence contributes to the deliberate ambiguity surrounding resistance leadership.

Analysts note that this intentional mystery forms part of a security strategy aimed at protecting leadership while unsettling the enemy.

title: Israel releases footage of strike that killed Hamas Spokesperson Abu Obaida
description:
Israelâ€™s army released footage showing a strike that killed Hamas spokesperson Abu Obeida in Gaza last week. A photo showing Abu Obeida with late Hamas military chief Mohammed Deif was also released. title: The IDF target Abu Obaida Precision Strike.
Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida breaks silence after four months
description:
Abu Obeida, spokesman for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, the Ezzedine al-Qassam Brigades, broke his silence with his first public video statement since March 6, over four months ago. In his address, he accused Israel of obstructing ongoing indirect negotiations, mediated by Qatar since July 6, aimed at reaching a temporary ceasefire and securing the release of hostages held in Gaza.
He expressed full support for the Palestinian resistance delegation and reaffirmed Hamasâ€™s readiness to conclude a comprehensive deal that would involve the release of all captives simultaneously. However, he blamed Israeli leadership, specifically Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu for rejecting these offers and questioned their sincerity in seeking the return of the hostages.

title: Abu Obaida assassination rumors "part of Israeli psychological war", says Hamas
description:
Security forces of the Palestinian resistance have cautioned the public against recent 'Israeli' claims suggesting that Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, had been assassinated in Gaza.

According to the resistance, these rumors are part of a deliberate 'Israeli' campaign designed to serve intelligence and psychological objectives.

The statement highlighted that 'Israeli' media is heavily controlled by the military and intelligence agencies, and nothing is published without prior security approval. Past incidents have shown that 'Israel' often spreads false reports about targeted leaders to manipulate their behavior, gather intelligence, and prepare for potential operations.

The resistance warned that such misinformation is part of a broader psychological warfare effort intended to destabilize internal morale and create confusion within Gaza.

Citizens were urged not to circulate these claims, emphasizing that these rumors are aimed at weakening public confidence and undermining the unity of the Palestinian front.

title: Abu Obaida delivers first speech since ceasefire
description:
"This could have been achieved a year ago if it suited Netanyahu."

Abu Obaida, the spokesman for Al-Qassam Brigades, Hamas' military wing, delivered a speech after the ceasefire went into effect in Gaza on Sunday morning.

In his address, Abu Obaida confirmed Hamas' commitment to the ceasefire and called on international mediators to ensure Israel abided by the agreement.

He also blamed Israel's government for delaying its agreement to a ceasefire for months, and thanked armed groups across the region for their solidarity with Gaza.

Lastly, he assured Palestinians in Gaza that this was a time for rebuilding and unity as they recover from the immense destruction of Israel's war on the strip and look to the future.

title: Hamas is still committed to truce says Qassam Brigades spokesperson
description:
Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for the Qassam Brigades - Hamas's military wing - said on Thursday that should Israel return to war in Gaza, it will risk the lives of the remaining living captives.

In a 12-minute video posted to Telegram, Abu Obeida said that Hamas says is still committed to abiding by a ceasefire deal.

"Despite all the enemy's attempts at evasion, lies and deception, we preferred and still prefer to adhere to the agreement in order to spare the blood of our people," he added.

title: Juru Bicara Al Qassam Abu Obeida Minta Jemaah Haji yang Wukuf di Arafah untuk Doakan Palestina
description:
TRIBUN-VIDEO.COM - Juru bicara militer Brigade Al-Qassam, Abu Obeida mengirimkan pesan ke jutaan umat muslim yang tengah menjalankan wukuf di Arafah dalam ibadah haji.

Dalam pesannya, Abu Obeida meminta agar para jamaah yang sedang berwukuf untuk berdoa bagi Gaza dan Palestina.

"Kami mengimbau â€œpara peziarah Rumah Suci Allah untuk mengenang saudara-saudara mereka di Gaza dan Palestina dengan doa tulus mereka di tempat-tempat suci dan selama ritual haji,â€ katanya dalam sebuah pernyataan yang dilansir Khaberni, Sabtu.

Abu Obeida memohon agar di waktu yang mustajab, doa-doa dihaturkan untuk perjuangan Gaza melawan Israel.

Seperti diketahui pada Sabtu (15/6/2024) seluruh jemaah haji melaksanakan wukuf di Padang Arafah.

Prosesi haji 1445 H akan memasuki puncaknya.

Momen wukuf bagi jemaah haji ini begitu sakral.

Sebab di fase inilah, para jemaah haji diajak untuk berkomunikasi langsung dengan Sang Pencipta di waktu dan tempat yang mustajab.(Tribun-Video.Com)



Program: To The Point
Host: Mei Sada Sirait

title: Israel pushes tanks further into Gaza city after Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida killed | BBC News
description:
Israel has pushed tanks further into Gaza City and detonated vehicles containing explosives, according to witnesses there. 

At least 98 people have been killed in Israel's continued bombardment of Gaza in the last 24 hours, according to health officials in the territory. 

Israel has said Abu Obeida, the spokesman for Hamas's armed wing, has been killed in an aerial attack in Gaza City.

Israel's Defence Minister Israel Katz congratulated the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) and Israel's security agency, Shin Bet, for the "flawless execution" in a post on X.

Hamas has not confirmed his death. The Palestinian armed group earlier said dozens of civilians were killed and injured in the Israeli air strikes on a residential building in the district.

title: Uncertainty surrounds Qassam's spokesperson Abu Obaida as rumors of injury or death surge online
description:
Amid rapid developments following the Gaza ceasefire, uncertainty has returned over the fate of Al-Qassam Brigadesâ€™ military spokesperson, Abu Obaida. His prolonged absence has sparked a storm of rumors and speculation across social media platforms.

Over the past 24 hours, the X platform (formerly Twitter) has seen a surge of Arabic posts exceeding 50,000 interactions. Reports have ranged from claims of â€œserious injuryâ€ following an assassination attempt to unconfirmed statements of his safety, turning Abu Obaidaâ€™s status into a heated topic and a psychological battleground online.

Rumors Surge: â€œSeverely Injuredâ€ or â€œConfirmed Martyrdomâ€?
The rumors intensified on Tuesday evening, with posts claiming to convey a â€œmessage from an Al-Qassam leaderâ€ stating that Abu Obaida had sustained a â€œserious injury from an attackâ€ but was â€œunder specialized medical care and in stable condition,â€ adding that the assassination attempt had failed. These claims were widely circulated and accompanied by prayers for his recovery.

Meanwhile, other voices suggested that he may have been martyred, arguing that his weeks-long absence is the strongest indicator. Activists cautioned against falling for what they described as a â€œpsychological warfareâ€ tactic by 'Israel', urging the public to wait for an official statement.

Concern, Prayers, and Faith in the Resistance
The conflicting rumors have sparked widespread concern and prayers across Arab and Palestinian communities. X has been flooded with posts asking for Abu Obaidaâ€™s safety, while others shared clips of his previous speeches, emphasizing his symbolic importance.

At the same time, many expressed confidence in his survival, viewing the silence from the resistance as a deliberate tactic. One user wrote, â€œThe mistake of revealing resistance leaders during the truce wonâ€™t be repeated. God willing, Abu Obaida is alive, and when the war officially ends, he will deliver the victory speech at the Saraya Square in Gaza.â€

Digital Battlefield: Psychological Warfare Online
Analysts say the past 24 hours illustrate a new chapter in the psychological warfare between Hamas and 'Israel'. In the absence of official information, digital platforms have become a key battleground where each side seeks to shape narratives and influence public morale.

On one hand, 'Israel' reportedly spreads rumors of assassination or injury to sow doubt and demoralize supporters of Hamas. On the other, Hamas follows a â€œstrategic ambiguityâ€ approach, letting silence generate speculation and maintaining the initiative in the psychological arena. In this information vacuum, Abu Obaidaâ€™s fate remains unknown, yet he continues to symbolize steadfastness in the eyes of those who support him.

Historical Context: The Green Symbol of Resistance
Abu Obaida, the nom de guerre of Al-Qassamâ€™s military spokesperson, became the most prominent media face of the resistance after announcing Operation Aqsa Typhoon on October 7, 2023.

He is known for speeches that combine warnings to 'Israel' with messages of hope for supporters of the resistance. This role has made him a primary target, with 'Israel' claiming in August 2025 that he had been killed in an airstrike, a claim never officially confirmed by Hamas. His continued absence contributes to the deliberate ambiguity surrounding resistance leadership.

Analysts note that this intentional mystery forms part of a security strategy aimed at protecting leadership while unsettling the enemy.

title: Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida breaks silence after four months
description:
Abu Obeida, spokesman for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, the Ezzedine al-Qassam Brigades, broke his silence with his first public video statement since March 6, over four months ago. In his address, he accused Israel of obstructing ongoing indirect negotiations, mediated by Qatar since July 6, aimed at reaching a temporary ceasefire and securing the release of hostages held in Gaza.
He expressed full support for the Palestinian resistance delegation and reaffirmed Hamasâ€™s readiness to conclude a comprehensive deal that would involve the release of all captives simultaneously. However, he blamed Israeli leadership, specifically Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu for rejecting these offers and questioned their sincerity in seeking the return of the hostages.

title: Abu Obaida assassination rumors "part of Israeli psychological war", says Hamas
description:
Security forces of the Palestinian resistance have cautioned the public against recent 'Israeli' claims suggesting that Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, had been assassinated in Gaza.

According to the resistance, these rumors are part of a deliberate 'Israeli' campaign designed to serve intelligence and psychological objectives.

The statement highlighted that 'Israeli' media is heavily controlled by the military and intelligence agencies, and nothing is published without prior security approval. Past incidents have shown that 'Israel' often spreads false reports about targeted leaders to manipulate their behavior, gather intelligence, and prepare for potential operations.

The resistance warned that such misinformation is part of a broader psychological warfare effort intended to destabilize internal morale and create confusion within Gaza.

Citizens were urged not to circulate these claims, emphasizing that these rumors are aimed at weakening public confidence and undermining the unity of the Palestinian front.

title: Abu Obaida delivers first speech since ceasefire
description:
"This could have been achieved a year ago if it suited Netanyahu."

Abu Obaida, the spokesman for Al-Qassam Brigades, Hamas' military wing, delivered a speech after the ceasefire went into effect in Gaza on Sunday morning.

In his address, Abu Obaida confirmed Hamas' commitment to the ceasefire and called on international mediators to ensure Israel abided by the agreement.

He also blamed Israel's government for delaying its agreement to a ceasefire for months, and thanked armed groups across the region for their solidarity with Gaza.

Lastly, he assured Palestinians in Gaza that this was a time for rebuilding and unity as they recover from the immense destruction of Israel's war on the strip and look to the future.

title: Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida breaks silence after four months
description:
Abu Obeida, spokesman for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, the Ezzedine al-Qassam Brigades, broke his silence with his first public video statement since March 6, over four months ago. In his address, he accused Israel of obstructing ongoing indirect negotiations, mediated by Qatar since July 6, aimed at reaching a temporary ceasefire and securing the release of hostages held in Gaza.
He expressed full support for the Palestinian resistance delegation and reaffirmed Hamasâ€™s readiness to conclude a comprehensive deal that would involve the release of all captives simultaneously. However, he blamed Israeli leadership, specifically Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu for rejecting these offers and questioned their sincerity in seeking the return of the hostages.

title: Abu Obaida: Netanyahu rejected full exchange deal because remaining captives are soldiers
description:
Abu Obaida, spokesperson for Al-Qassam Brigades, appeared in a newly released video on Friday, marking his first public statement since March 6, 2025.

In the video, he said four months had passed since the â€œIsraeliâ€ military resumed its aggression on Gaza, accusing â€œIsraelâ€ of betraying the terms of a previously agreed deal with the resistance.

He said that 'Israel' violated the truce and overturned commitments made during negotiations, leading to a renewed escalation in the aggression, in reference to "Israel's" surprise attack on Gaza in March during a declared ceasefire between the two parties.

Abu Obaida said Al-Qassam fighters have killed or wounded hundreds of â€œIsraeliâ€ soldiers in recent months, while thousands more have reportedly suffered psychological trauma and shock. He added that the resistance has introduced new tactics and methods, drawing lessons from what he described as the longest war in the history of the Palestinian people.

He revealed that fighters have attempted several operations in recent weeks aimed at capturing â€œIsraeliâ€ soldiers. Capturing soldiers has been a long-standing goal for the group, often used to negotiate prisoner exchanges.

Abu Obaida described Gazaâ€™s armed resistance as â€œthe greatest military school for a people resisting occupation in modern history,â€ affirming that they remain fully prepared to continue a prolonged war of attrition against the occupation, regardless of the form or strategy of future assaults.

He said the current strategy of Al-Qassamâ€™s leadership is to inflict maximum losses on â€œIsraeliâ€ forces, carry out high-impact operations, and pursue the capture of soldiers.

In a regional message, he strongly criticized Arab leaders for their silence, saying: â€œThe enemy would not have committed genocide in full view of the nationâ€™s leaders unless it was assured of impunity, guaranteed silence, and bought betrayal.â€

He stressed that no one was exempt from the responsibility of the bloodshed: â€œWe do not absolve anyone. Everyone who can act, according to their ability and influence, must do so.â€

He also praised Yemenâ€™s Ansar Allah (Houthis), calling them â€œtruthful brothersâ€ who forced the enemy to face a new front and â€œexposed the cowardice of those who remain passive.â€

Abu Obaida extended his thanks to â€œall the free people around the worldâ€ who have shown solidarity and attempted to break the siege on Gaza despite risks.

He reiterated support for the Palestinian negotiating delegation in indirect talks with â€œIsrael,â€ stating that Hamas had offered a comprehensive deal to release all enemy captives at once.

â€œWar criminal Netanyahu and his ministers rejected our offer. It became clear they are not interested in the fate of their soldiers,â€ he said, accusing the 'Israeli' leadership of preparing the public for the possibility that all prisoners might be dead.

He concluded by expressing hope that the ongoing negotiations would lead to a deal ensuring an end to what he called a â€œgenocidal war,â€ the withdrawal of occupying forces, and urgent humanitarian relief for Gaza.

title: Abu Obeida: Akhir Sebuah Narasi atau Awal Legenda?
description:
â€œSeorang tokoh yang selama dua dekade terakhir menjadi suara utama Hamas kini telah terdiam. Abu Obeida, juru bicara Brigade al-Qassam, dikonfirmasi tewas akibat serangan Israel. Apakah ini akhir dari simbol perlawanan Palestina, atau justru awal dari legenda baru yang akan terus bergema?

Dalam video ini, Agnivarta membedah makna geopolitik di balik kematian Abu Obeida: pesan Israel kepada Hamas, Iran, dan Hizbullah; dampak bagi Gaza yang tengah luluh lantak; serta bagaimana peristiwa ini bisa menjadi babak baru dalam konflik Timur Tengah.

Karena di dunia geopolitik, kematian seorang tokoh bukanlah akhirâ€”melainkan bagian dari cerita panjang yang tak pernah benar-benar tenang.â€



#Agnivarta #Geopolitics #MiddleEast #Israel #Hamas #Gaza #AbuObeida #Conflict #Analysis

title: Israel Kills 'Face of Hamas' in Gaza City Attack
description:
Abu Obeida was a steadfast voice of the resistance in Palestine. The red keffiyeh wearing firebrand represented Hamas' military wing for nearly two decades.

But no longer. Israeli airstrikes killed the Al-Qassam Brigades spokesperson in Gaza City, as the IDF continues preparations for its offensive in the Gaza Strip.

Hamas' leadership is now weaker than ever - as Israel readies itself for its next advance in the war, while showing no signs of stopping.

title: â€˜The Fighting Leaderâ€™ Declared: Abu Obeida Swears Loyalty to Yahya Sinwar in Hamas Power Shift
description:
In a significant development within the Palestinian Resistance Movement, Hamas, Yahya Sinwar has been appointed as the new leader following the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran on July 31. The announcement was made after days of deliberation by the Hamas shura council, which unanimously elected Sinwar to head the organisation. Abu Obeida, the military spokesperson for the Al-Qassam Brigades, the military wing of Hamas, confirmed Sinwarâ€™s appointment in a statement released on the groupâ€™s Telegram channel. The Al-Qassam Brigades have pledged their unwavering allegiance to Sinwar, emphasising their readiness to carry out his directives. Obeida described Sinwarâ€™s selection as a testament to Hamasâ€™s vitality, unity, and strength despite the recent loss of Haniyeh.

title: Abu Obeida Peringatkan Israel akan Tuai Hasil Kehancuran Hebat, jika Hamas Bangkit Pakai Taktik Baru
description:
Download aplikasi berita TribunX di Play Store atau App Store untuk dapatkan pengalaman baru.

TRIBUN-VIDEO.COM - Juru bicara militer Brigade Al-Qassam Hamas, Abu Obeida peringatkan Israel.

Obeida memperingatkan bahwa Israel akan alami kerugian yang lebih besar lagi yang menuju kehancuran.

Mengutip Palestine Chronicle pada (14/1), peringatan itu dilontarkan Obeida dalam pernyataan resminya pada Senin (13/1/2025).

Lebih tepatnya, Obeida menyatakan bahwa meskipun lebih dari 100 hari penghancuran dan genosida yang meluas oleh militer Israel di Gaza utara.

Namun, Perlawanan disebutnya akan terus menimbulkan kerugian bahkan signifikan di antara pasukan Israel. 

Obeida mengumumkan bahwa lebih dari 10 tentara IDF telah tewas dan bahkan puluhan lainnya terluka hanya dalam 72 jam terakhir.

Ia juga memperingatkan bahwa kerugian Israel akan jauh lebih besar daripada yang diakui publik.

Serta, meramalkan bahwa militer Israel pada akhirnya akan menarik diri dari Gaza utara â€œdengan maluâ€ tanpa mengatasi Perlawanan.

Odeida juga mengkritik tindakan militer Israel, dengan menyatakan bahwa hasil utama dari tindakan tersebut adalah â€œkehancuran dan kehancuran, serta pembantaian warga sipil yang tidak bersalah.â€

(Tribun-Video.com)

Artikel ini telah tayang di Palestine Chronicle dengan judul Abu Obeida: Hamasâ€™ Resistance Secures Victories While Israel Targets Civilians, https://www.palestinechronicle.com/abu-obeida-hamas-resistance-secures-victories-while-israel-targets-civilians/.
Penulis: Palestine Chronicle

title: Temporary agreement not possible without progress towards permanent ceasefire, Hamas
description:
Gaza: (D1C News)
Abu Obeida, a spokesman for the Palestinian resistance movement Hamas, has said that they are in favor of a temporary ceasefire in Gaza, but if such an agreement is not reached in the ongoing negotiations, then a full agreement may be demanded to end the conflict.

According to a report by the foreign #news  agency Reuters, Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida said that Hamas has been continuously offering the release of prisoners in Gaza and a permanent ceasefire agreement, but Israel has refused.

#AbuObeida said that if the #enemy  continues to be stubborn and moves away from this stage as before, then we cannot guarantee temporary agreements or the plan for 10 prisoners.

A statement issued by Israeli Prime Minister #benjaminnetanyahu  #netanyahu  's office said that he was busy meeting with #popeleo  on Friday regarding the release of prisoners and efforts for a 60-day ceasefire, but no offer has been made to Hamas so far.

In the event of a possible agreement between Hamas and Israel, the bodies of 10 prisoners and 18 prisoners in Gaza will be returned and the agreement will last 60 days, and Israel will release several Palestinians in return.

A Hamas official said regarding the agreement that there is still a dispute over the withdrawal of Israeli troops, the method of providing aid to Gaza, and the guarantees of a possible agreement to make progress towards ending the war.

He said that there has been no breakthrough in the negotiations on the issues under discussion.

Hamas maintains that there should be an agreement that makes progress towards a permanent ceasefire, while Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu says that the war can only end when Hamas is eliminated and its leadership leaves Gaza.

It should be noted that more than 58,600 Palestinians have been martyred so far in the war in Gaza launched by Israel on October 7, 2023, while according to Israeli officials, 1,650 of their people have been killed.

title: Israel's â€˜Criminal Army is falling apartâ€™ - Abu Obeida's full expression
description:
#Israel #Criminal #ArmyFalling
#aqsa #brigade #latest #obeida #palestine #video #statement #speech #hamas #obaida #qassam

By Palestine Chronicle Team  Abu Ubeida said that Israeli army hid true extent of its losses in Gaza Strip and promised to defeat Israeli occupiers. The spokesman for Al-Qassam Brigades, the military wing of Palestinian Resistance Movement Hamas, issued a new statement today, Friday. The statement coincided with two videos produced by the Brigade's Military Media showing several Israeli military tanks being targeted by Palestinian Resistance missiles in various parts of Gaza. Abu Ubeida warned Israeli army of certain defeat, praised the Palestinians for their resistance, and promised to inflict even more severe damage on occupying Israeli forces in Gaza. Below are excerpts from Abu Obeida's recorded statement, transmitted by the group's Telegram channel. Historical Battles "70 days have passed since beginning of the battle of Al-Aqsa Flood, and our people are still fighting this struggle, facing a crime unprecedented in modern times. "Our brave warriors, under the guise of forces of oppression aggression, led by the American administration, which provides air support to this formation, It is fighting with a heavily armed force, supported by aircraft, warships and armored vehicles, equipped with lethal weapons ammunition. as if he were fighting with a great force between the poles of the earth. â€œYet our warriors fight heroically and proudly in historic battles. The whole world sees how our warriors destroy and burn the enemy's armored vehicles and kill the invading soldiers inside. â€œThe world also sees the enemy's raining down , engaging in destruction, displacement, starvation torture of innocent, safe civilians, including children, women and the elderly, as clear obvious war crimes. Abu Ubeida, military spokesman of Al-Qassam Brigades, armed wing of Palestinian Resistance Movement Hamas, announced in his speech on Friday that Palestinian fighters destroyed 100 Israeli military vehicles in last five days. zBwL2seFDc â€” Palestine Chronicle December 15, 2023 Five Days â€“ 100 Vehicles â€œIn last five days, our fighters targeted more than 100 military vehicles in axes of Zionist aggression Jabaliyah, Al-Shujaiyyah, Sheikh Radwan, Al-Zaytun, central region and Khan Younis in southern Gaza Strip. . "Over the last five days, our fighters have conducted multiple precision ambushes against the enemy's infantry forces in Jabaliya, Sheikh Radwan, Shujaiyya headquarters and Khan Younis. â€œThese include luring enemy forces into buildings that our fighters have identified as accessible to the enemy, then detonating anti-personnel devices and There was also attacking these forces with machine guns from close range. In many operations, anti-fortification cannons were used directly over the heads of the occupation soldiers. "During these operations, our warriors inflicted many deaths and injuries on the enemy forces. Our warriors heard the screams of the enemy soldiers, their calls for help, and their experiences after each operation." It constantly observes their hysterical reactions in form of aimlessly firing bullets cannons everywhere to cover up horror and take bodies of dead injured. â€œWe also monitor rescue attempts using vehicles and helicopters over the separation fence at all hours of day. â€œOur fighters are increasingly convinced that the enemy is using mercenaries in what he claims is a war for existence and national honor.â€ Fingers on the Trigger "O great people, our nation free people world, we, Al Qassam Brigades, confirm after 70 days wars, conflicts and attacks, we have brave warriors from Beit, heroes Jabaliya, Lahia, Beit Hanoun, Gaza, Sheikh Radvan, Khan "We see that it is not brigades are destroyed, but criminal army barbarian aggression enemy. What the enemy deceived itself will soon be revealed to be a mirage and a great illusion, thanks to the will and power of Allah." The of our warriors with the enemy forces has revealed how weak and cowardly the army is. They know nothing about morality and rely on technology and silent vehicles, not their warriors. When moment truth and confrontation comes, they run away like children, screaming, begging, easily caught by our warriors, attacked "And this confirms words of Allah Almighty 'They will not fight against all you unless they are inside fortified cities or behind walls.'" description:
Who exactly is Abu Obeida, the masked Hamas spokesman who rose to prominence after the Hamas-led surprise attack on Israel on 7 October? 

Heâ€™s a hero for many in the Arab world but his prominence has made him a target for the Israeli military and his high-ranking position in Hamas - a designated terrorist organisation by the US and UK - has resulted in his inclusion on Washington's sanctions list.

title: Sebut Jakarta dalam Pidatonya, Hamas Tak Lupakan Dukungan Indonesia
description:
VIVA - Abu Ubaida, jubir bicara Brigade Izzuddin Al-Qassam, sayap militer Hamas menyampaikan pidato terkait gencatan senjata yang tengah berlangsung.Pidato tersebut ia sampaikan pada Minggu 19 Januari 2025.

Dalam pidatonya tersebut Ubaida menyampaikan banyak hal terkait gencatan senjata yang tengah berlangsung. Ia juga menyampaikan terima kasih kepada seluruh pihak yang mendukung perjuangan warga Gaza terbebas dari penjajahan Israel.

title: Abu Obaida assassination rumors "part of Israeli psychological war", says Hamas
description:
Security forces of the Palestinian resistance have cautioned the public against recent 'Israeli' claims suggesting that Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, had been assassinated in Gaza.

According to the resistance, these rumors are part of a deliberate 'Israeli' campaign designed to serve intelligence and psychological objectives.

The statement highlighted that 'Israeli' media is heavily controlled by the military and intelligence agencies, and nothing is published without prior security approval. Past incidents have shown that 'Israel' often spreads false reports about targeted leaders to manipulate their behavior, gather intelligence, and prepare for potential operations.

The resistance warned that such misinformation is part of a broader psychological warfare effort intended to destabilize internal morale and create confusion within Gaza.

Citizens were urged not to circulate these claims, emphasizing that these rumors are aimed at weakening public confidence and undermining the unity of the Palestinian front.

title: Hamas' Abu Obaida's 2021 Speech Shared By Palestinians Amid Release Of Hostages, Prisoners | Israel
description:
Amid celebrations in both Israel and Palestinian territories over the release of hostages and prisoners, Palestinians shared a clip from an old speech of Abu Obaida, the spokesperson of Hamas' military wing Al Qassam Brigades. Obaida is heard speaking on the Gilboa jailbreak of 2021. Meanwhile, Hamas released 24 hostages - both Israeli and foreigners - and Israel released 39 Palestinian prisoners from its jails. Ø£Ø¨Ùˆ Ø¹Ø¨ÙŠØ¯Ø© ÙÙŠ Ø¢Ø®Ø± Ø®Ø·Ø§Ø¨ Ù…ØµÙˆØ±: "Ø¥Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù†ØµØ± Ù…Ø¹ Ø§Ù„ØµØ¨Ø±" ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸

Abu Obaida in His Last Video Speech: "Victory Comes with Patience" ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸


Victory comes with patience.
 And relief comes with hardship.
 And with difficulty comes ease.
And finally, O sons of our steadfast, great people.
O source of revolution.
And forge of men.
You who bid farewell each day
 to a radiant convoy of martyrs.
O brothers of Moses,
 the one who spoke with God, who was harmed
 by the fiercest enemies of God,
 yet only said: "Indeed, My Lord is with me, He will guide me."
O descendants of Joseph the Truthful,
 whom his brothers betrayed and cast
 into the depths of the well, 
but victory and empowerment came to him.
O beloved of Muhammad, peace be upon him,
 who was besieged in the valley, forced to the cave,
 and pressed upon at Uhud, yet help came
 from his Lord: â€œSo Allah will suffice you.â€
O brothers of the family of Yasir,
 who were tortured for God, to whom the Prophet said:
 â€œBe patient, O family of Yasir, for your promise is Paradiseâ€
Your steadfastness despite betrayal,
 your patience, your giving,
 your defiance of oppression and deprivationâ€”
 this is what enrages your enemies the most.
And indeed, this night will surely have an end.
 And victory comes with patience.
 And relief comes with hardship.
 And with difficulty comes ease.
We kiss the heads of all our people,
 the elders who are steadfast,
 steadfast at the frontlines,
 victorious by the will of God.
We raise to them the highest salute
 and give them the glad tidings
 from our Lord, the Almighty.
With Allah is the Decision, in the past and in the Future: on that Day shall the Believers rejoice, With the help of Allah. He helps whom He will, and He is exalted in might, most merciful, (It is) the promise of Allah. Never does Allah depart from His promise: but most men understand not.

title: Abu Obaida delivers first speech since ceasefire
description:
"This could have been achieved a year ago if it suited Netanyahu."

Abu Obaida, the spokesman for Al-Qassam Brigades, Hamas' military wing, delivered a speech after the ceasefire went into effect in Gaza on Sunday morning.

In his address, Abu Obaida confirmed Hamas' commitment to the ceasefire and called on international mediators to ensure Israel abided by the agreement.

He also blamed Israel's government for delaying its agreement to a ceasefire for months, and thanked armed groups across the region for their solidarity with Gaza.

Lastly, he assured Palestinians in Gaza that this was a time for rebuilding and unity as they recover from the immense destruction of Israel's war on the strip and look to the future.

title: Hamas is still committed to truce says Qassam Brigades spokesperson
description:
Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for the Qassam Brigades - Hamas's military wing - said on Thursday that should Israel return to war in Gaza, it will risk the lives of the remaining living captives.

In a 12-minute video posted to Telegram, Abu Obeida said that Hamas says is still committed to abiding by a ceasefire deal.

"Despite all the enemy's attempts at evasion, lies and deception, we preferred and still prefer to adhere to the agreement in order to spare the blood of our people," he added.

title: Abu Obaida Is Back! New Video â€˜Proof' Of IDFâ€™s â€˜Failedâ€™ Strike To Kill Hamas Spokesperson | Watch
description:
Abu Obeida, spokesperson of Hamasâ€™ Al Qassam Brigades, appeared in a new video Monday, defying Israeli claims of his assassination. The IDF earlier said it conducted a targeted strike in Gazaâ€™s al-Rimal neighborhood on August 30, reportedly killing Obeida, his wife, and children. Saudi network Al Arabiya cited sources confirming his death, while Israeli media echoed optimism he was eliminated. Hamas and Palestinian outlets neither denied nor confirmed the reports. The masked spokesmanâ€™s latest video, of unclear recording date, reignited speculation. Just days earlier, Obeida warned Israel of bloodshed and hostage risks if Gaza Cityâ€™s offensive continued. title: Hamas Tak Lupa Dukungan Indonesia, Jubir Al-Qassam Sebut Jakarta dalam Pidato usai Gencatan Senjata
description:
Download aplikasi berita TribunX di Play Store atau App Store untuk dapatkan pengalaman baru

TRIBUN-VIDEO.COM - Juru Bicara Sayap Militer Hamas, Brigade Al-Qassam berpidato setelah gencatan senjata perang Gaza resmi berlaku.

Pidato Jubir bernama Abu Obeida itu pun akhirnya mengudara pada Minggu (19/1/2025).

Pidato itu berdurasi sangat panjang, puluhan menit.

Dalam bagian pidatonya, Abu Obeida tidak melupakan jasa Indonesia dalam membantu Palestina.

Ia menyebut 'Jakarta' sebagai representasi rakyat Indonesia, yang telah memberikan dukungan pada perjuangan rakyat Palestina.

Abu Obeida juga menyampaikan terima kasih kepada seluruh pihak yang mendukung perjuangan warga Gaza terbebas dari penjajahan Israel.

Adapun, Abu Ubaida kemudian menekankan komitmen semua pasukan perlawanan untuk mematuhi ketentuan gencatan senjata.

Namun, tentu saja hal itu juga bergantung pada komitmen pasukan pendudukan Israel.

(Tribun-Video.com/palestinechronicle.com)

Artikel ini telah tayang di palestinechronicle.com dengan judul Abu Obeidaâ€™s First Ceasefire Speech: The Final Nail in the Occupationâ€™s Coffin,
https://www.palestinechronicle.com/abu-obeidas-first-ceasefire-speech-the-final-nail-in-the-occupations-coffin/

title: Israel pushes tanks further into Gaza city after Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida killed | BBC News
description:
Israel has pushed tanks further into Gaza City and detonated vehicles containing explosives, according to witnesses there. 

At least 98 people have been killed in Israel's continued bombardment of Gaza in the last 24 hours, according to health officials in the territory. 

Israel has said Abu Obeida, the spokesman for Hamas's armed wing, has been killed in an aerial attack in Gaza City.

Israel's Defence Minister Israel Katz congratulated the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) and Israel's security agency, Shin Bet, for the "flawless execution" in a post on X.

Hamas has not confirmed his death. The Palestinian armed group earlier said dozens of civilians were killed and injured in the Israeli air strikes on a residential building in the district.

title: Netanyahuâ€™s Health Mystery Deepens as Houthis Hammer Israel, Abu Obaida Makes Chilling Return
description:
Just as Hamas and Houthis ramp up attacks on Israel, PM Netanyahu disappears from the spotlight. Diagnosed with food poisoning and dehydration, Netanyahu is now working from home. The sudden health scare has raised new concerns about wartime leadership. Meanwhile, Abu Obaida reemerges on camera after months, slamming Arab leaders and accusing Israel of ignoring hostage proposals. As Gaza burns and Houthi missiles fly, is Israel losing its war commander at the worst time?

title: Uncertainty surrounds Qassam's spokesperson Abu Obaida as rumors of injury or death surge online
description:
Amid rapid developments following the Gaza ceasefire, uncertainty has returned over the fate of Al-Qassam Brigadesâ€™ military spokesperson, Abu Obaida. His prolonged absence has sparked a storm of rumors and speculation across social media platforms.

Over the past 24 hours, the X platform (formerly Twitter) has seen a surge of Arabic posts exceeding 50,000 interactions. Reports have ranged from claims of â€œserious injuryâ€ following an assassination attempt to unconfirmed statements of his safety, turning Abu Obaidaâ€™s status into a heated topic and a psychological battleground online.

Rumors Surge: â€œSeverely Injuredâ€ or â€œConfirmed Martyrdomâ€?
The rumors intensified on Tuesday evening, with posts claiming to convey a â€œmessage from an Al-Qassam leaderâ€ stating that Abu Obaida had sustained a â€œserious injury from an attackâ€ but was â€œunder specialized medical care and in stable condition,â€ adding that the assassination attempt had failed. These claims were widely circulated and accompanied by prayers for his recovery.

Meanwhile, other voices suggested that he may have been martyred, arguing that his weeks-long absence is the strongest indicator. Activists cautioned against falling for what they described as a â€œpsychological warfareâ€ tactic by 'Israel', urging the public to wait for an official statement.

Concern, Prayers, and Faith in the Resistance
The conflicting rumors have sparked widespread concern and prayers across Arab and Palestinian communities. X has been flooded with posts asking for Abu Obaidaâ€™s safety, while others shared clips of his previous speeches, emphasizing his symbolic importance.

At the same time, many expressed confidence in his survival, viewing the silence from the resistance as a deliberate tactic. One user wrote, â€œThe mistake of revealing resistance leaders during the truce wonâ€™t be repeated. God willing, Abu Obaida is alive, and when the war officially ends, he will deliver the victory speech at the Saraya Square in Gaza.â€

Digital Battlefield: Psychological Warfare Online
Analysts say the past 24 hours illustrate a new chapter in the psychological warfare between Hamas and 'Israel'. In the absence of official information, digital platforms have become a key battleground where each side seeks to shape narratives and influence public morale.

On one hand, 'Israel' reportedly spreads rumors of assassination or injury to sow doubt and demoralize supporters of Hamas. On the other, Hamas follows a â€œstrategic ambiguityâ€ approach, letting silence generate speculation and maintaining the initiative in the psychological arena. In this information vacuum, Abu Obaidaâ€™s fate remains unknown, yet he continues to symbolize steadfastness in the eyes of those who support him.

Historical Context: The Green Symbol of Resistance
Abu Obaida, the nom de guerre of Al-Qassamâ€™s military spokesperson, became the most prominent media face of the resistance after announcing Operation Aqsa Typhoon on October 7, 2023.

He is known for speeches that combine warnings to 'Israel' with messages of hope for supporters of the resistance. This role has made him a primary target, with 'Israel' claiming in August 2025 that he had been killed in an airstrike, a claim never officially confirmed by Hamas. His continued absence contributes to the deliberate ambiguity surrounding resistance leadership.

Analysts note that this intentional mystery forms part of a security strategy aimed at protecting leadership while unsettling the enemy.

title: The IDF target Abu Obaida Precision Strike.
Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida breaks silence after four months
description:
Abu Obeida, spokesman for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, the Ezzedine al-Qassam Brigades, broke his silence with his first public video statement since March 6, over four months ago. In his address, he accused Israel of obstructing ongoing indirect negotiations, mediated by Qatar since July 6, aimed at reaching a temporary ceasefire and securing the release of hostages held in Gaza.
He expressed full support for the Palestinian resistance delegation and reaffirmed Hamasâ€™s readiness to conclude a comprehensive deal that would involve the release of all captives simultaneously. However, he blamed Israeli leadership, specifically Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu for rejecting these offers and questioned their sincerity in seeking the return of the hostages.

title: Abu Obaida: Netanyahu rejected full exchange deal because remaining captives are soldiers
description:
Abu Obaida, spokesperson for Al-Qassam Brigades, appeared in a newly released video on Friday, marking his first public statement since March 6, 2025.

In the video, he said four months had passed since the â€œIsraeliâ€ military resumed its aggression on Gaza, accusing â€œIsraelâ€ of betraying the terms of a previously agreed deal with the resistance.

He said that 'Israel' violated the truce and overturned commitments made during negotiations, leading to a renewed escalation in the aggression, in reference to "Israel's" surprise attack on Gaza in March during a declared ceasefire between the two parties.

Abu Obaida said Al-Qassam fighters have killed or wounded hundreds of â€œIsraeliâ€ soldiers in recent months, while thousands more have reportedly suffered psychological trauma and shock. He added that the resistance has introduced new tactics and methods, drawing lessons from what he described as the longest war in the history of the Palestinian people.

He revealed that fighters have attempted several operations in recent weeks aimed at capturing â€œIsraeliâ€ soldiers. Capturing soldiers has been a long-standing goal for the group, often used to negotiate prisoner exchanges.

Abu Obaida described Gazaâ€™s armed resistance as â€œthe greatest military school for a people resisting occupation in modern history,â€ affirming that they remain fully prepared to continue a prolonged war of attrition against the occupation, regardless of the form or strategy of future assaults.

He said the current strategy of Al-Qassamâ€™s leadership is to inflict maximum losses on â€œIsraeliâ€ forces, carry out high-impact operations, and pursue the capture of soldiers.

In a regional message, he strongly criticized Arab leaders for their silence, saying: â€œThe enemy would not have committed genocide in full view of the nationâ€™s leaders unless it was assured of impunity, guaranteed silence, and bought betrayal.â€

He stressed that no one was exempt from the responsibility of the bloodshed: â€œWe do not absolve anyone. Everyone who can act, according to their ability and influence, must do so.â€

He also praised Yemenâ€™s Ansar Allah (Houthis), calling them â€œtruthful brothersâ€ who forced the enemy to face a new front and â€œexposed the cowardice of those who remain passive.â€

Abu Obaida extended his thanks to â€œall the free people around the worldâ€ who have shown solidarity and attempted to break the siege on Gaza despite risks.

He reiterated support for the Palestinian negotiating delegation in indirect talks with â€œIsrael,â€ stating that Hamas had offered a comprehensive deal to release all enemy captives at once.

â€œWar criminal Netanyahu and his ministers rejected our offer. It became clear they are not interested in the fate of their soldiers,â€ he said, accusing the 'Israeli' leadership of preparing the public for the possibility that all prisoners might be dead.

He concluded by expressing hope that the ongoing negotiations would lead to a deal ensuring an end to what he called a â€œgenocidal war,â€ the withdrawal of occupying forces, and urgent humanitarian relief for Gaza.

Abu Obaida's Al Aqsa War Cry For Ramadan; Hamas Commander's Longest Speech Since Oct 7 | Watch
description:
Hamas' military wing leader Abu Obaida has issued a fervent call for a month of "jihad and victories" during Ramadan, marking his lengthiest address since the October 7 massacre in Israel. In his speech, Obaida declared Ramadan as a month of obedience, jihad, and triumphs. This proclamation comes amidst escalating tensions, with President Biden acknowledging difficulties in securing a Gaza ceasefire. Obaida's rallying cry urges mobilization towards the Al-Aqsa Mosque, asserting its significance and calling for resistance against Israeli occupation. Meanwhile, Biden's optimism for a pre-Ramadan ceasefire wanes, expressing concern over potential violence in East Jerusalem as the holy month approaches. The Al-Aqsa Mosque dispute intensified following Israeli Minister Ben Gvir's statement, which Hamas swiftly responded to by urging protest marches to the mosque. Although Israel clarified Palestinians' access to Al-Aqsa on March 8, restrictions persist for West Bank Palestinians amid ongoing conflict. Ramadan, slated to commence imminently, underscores the region's fraught dynamics.

title: Abu Obaida assassination rumors "part of Israeli psychological war", says Hamas
description:
Security forces of the Palestinian resistance have cautioned the public against recent 'Israeli' claims suggesting that Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, had been assassinated in Gaza.

According to the resistance, these rumors are part of a deliberate 'Israeli' campaign designed to serve intelligence and psychological objectives.

The statement highlighted that 'Israeli' media is heavily controlled by the military and intelligence agencies, and nothing is published without prior security approval. Past incidents have shown that 'Israel' often spreads false reports about targeted leaders to manipulate their behavior, gather intelligence, and prepare for potential operations.

The resistance warned that such misinformation is part of a broader psychological warfare effort intended to destabilize internal morale and create confusion within Gaza.

Citizens were urged not to circulate these claims, emphasizing that these rumors are aimed at weakening public confidence and undermining the unity of the Palestinian front.

title: Hamas' Abu Obaida Taunts 'Israeli Diaper Army'; Netizens Join In As Gaza War Rages On | Viral
description:
Hamas spokesperson Abu Obeida took a stinging jibe at Israeli forces in an undated and unverified viral video. Obeida allegedly said that the IDF is the only army in the world that wears diapers, more specifically diapers. However, Hindustan Times can't independently verify the authenticity of the video. Netizens who are anti-Israel over its 'brutal' action in Gaza also took a barb at Israeli soldiers. Watch this video to know more.

title: Juru Bicara Al Qassam Abu Obeida Minta Jemaah Haji yang Wukuf di Arafah untuk Doakan Palestina
description:
TRIBUN-VIDEO.COM - Juru bicara militer Brigade Al-Qassam, Abu Obeida mengirimkan pesan ke jutaan umat muslim yang tengah menjalankan wukuf di Arafah dalam ibadah haji.

Dalam pesannya, Abu Obeida meminta agar para jamaah yang sedang berwukuf untuk berdoa bagi Gaza dan Palestina.

"Kami mengimbau â€œpara peziarah Rumah Suci Allah untuk mengenang saudara-saudara mereka di Gaza dan Palestina dengan doa tulus mereka di tempat-tempat suci dan selama ritual haji,â€ katanya dalam sebuah pernyataan yang dilansir Khaberni, Sabtu.

Abu Obeida memohon agar di waktu yang mustajab, doa-doa dihaturkan untuk perjuangan Gaza melawan Israel.

Seperti diketahui pada Sabtu (15/6/2024) seluruh jemaah haji melaksanakan wukuf di Padang Arafah.

Prosesi haji 1445 H akan memasuki puncaknya.

Momen wukuf bagi jemaah haji ini begitu sakral.

Sebab di fase inilah, para jemaah haji diajak untuk berkomunikasi langsung dengan Sang Pencipta di waktu dan tempat yang mustajab.(Tribun-Video.Com)

title: Israel pushes tanks further into Gaza city after Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida killed | BBC News
description:
Israel has pushed tanks further into Gaza City and detonated vehicles containing explosives, according to witnesses there. 

At least 98 people have been killed in Israel's continued bombardment of Gaza in the last 24 hours, according to health officials in the territory. 

Israel has said Abu Obeida, the spokesman for Hamas's armed wing, has been killed in an aerial attack in Gaza City.

Israel's Defence Minister Israel Katz congratulated the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) and Israel's security agency, Shin Bet, for the "flawless execution" in a post on X.

Hamas has not confirmed his death. The Palestinian armed group earlier said dozens of civilians were killed and injured in the Israeli air strikes on a residential building in the district.

title: Uncertainty surrounds Qassam's spokesperson Abu Obaida as rumors of injury or death surge online
description:
Amid rapid developments following the Gaza ceasefire, uncertainty has returned over the fate of Al-Qassam Brigadesâ€™ military spokesperson, Abu Obaida. His prolonged absence has sparked a storm of rumors and speculation across social media platforms.

Over the past 24 hours, the X platform (formerly Twitter) has seen a surge of Arabic posts exceeding 50,000 interactions. Reports have ranged from claims of â€œserious injuryâ€ following an assassination attempt to unconfirmed statements of his safety, turning Abu Obaidaâ€™s status into a heated topic and a psychological battleground online.

Rumors Surge: â€œSeverely Injuredâ€ or â€œConfirmed Martyrdomâ€?
The rumors intensified on Tuesday evening, with posts claiming to convey a â€œmessage from an Al-Qassam leaderâ€ stating that Abu Obaida had sustained a â€œserious injury from an attackâ€ but was â€œunder specialized medical care and in stable condition,â€ adding that the assassination attempt had failed. These claims were widely circulated and accompanied by prayers for his recovery.

Meanwhile, other voices suggested that he may have been martyred, arguing that his weeks-long absence is the strongest indicator. Activists cautioned against falling for what they described as a â€œpsychological warfareâ€ tactic by 'Israel', urging the public to wait for an official statement.

Concern, Prayers, and Faith in the Resistance
The conflicting rumors have sparked widespread concern and prayers across Arab and Palestinian communities. X has been flooded with posts asking for Abu Obaidaâ€™s safety, while others shared clips of his previous speeches, emphasizing his symbolic importance.

At the same time, many expressed confidence in his survival, viewing the silence from the resistance as a deliberate tactic. One user wrote, â€œThe mistake of revealing resistance leaders during the truce wonâ€™t be repeated. God willing, Abu Obaida is alive, and when the war officially ends, he will deliver the victory speech at the Saraya Square in Gaza.â€

Digital Battlefield: Psychological Warfare Online
Analysts say the past 24 hours illustrate a new chapter in the psychological warfare between Hamas and 'Israel'. In the absence of official information, digital platforms have become a key battleground where each side seeks to shape narratives and influence public morale.

On one hand, 'Israel' reportedly spreads rumors of assassination or injury to sow doubt and demoralize supporters of Hamas. On the other, Hamas follows a â€œstrategic ambiguityâ€ approach, letting silence generate speculation and maintaining the initiative in the psychological arena. In this information vacuum, Abu Obaidaâ€™s fate remains unknown, yet he continues to symbolize steadfastness in the eyes of those who support him.

Historical Context: The Green Symbol of Resistance
Abu Obaida, the nom de guerre of Al-Qassamâ€™s military spokesperson, became the most prominent media face of the resistance after announcing Operation Aqsa Typhoon on October 7, 2023.

He is known for speeches that combine warnings to 'Israel' with messages of hope for supporters of the resistance. This role has made him a primary target, with 'Israel' claiming in August 2025 that he had been killed in an airstrike, a claim never officially confirmed by Hamas. His continued absence contributes to the deliberate ambiguity surrounding resistance leadership.

Analysts note that this intentional mystery forms part of a security strategy aimed at protecting leadership while unsettling the enemy.

title: Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida breaks silence after four months
description:
Abu Obeida, spokesman for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, the Ezzedine al-Qassam Brigades, broke his silence with his first public video statement since March 6, over four months ago. In his address, he accused Israel of obstructing ongoing indirect negotiations, mediated by Qatar since July 6, aimed at reaching a temporary ceasefire and securing the release of hostages held in Gaza.
He expressed full support for the Palestinian resistance delegation and reaffirmed Hamasâ€™s readiness to conclude a comprehensive deal that would involve the release of all captives simultaneously. However, he blamed Israeli leadership, specifically Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu for rejecting these offers and questioned their sincerity in seeking the return of the hostages.

title: Hamas spokesperson Abu Obeida killed in Israeli strike
description: Israeli Defense Minister Israel Katz confirmed Sunday the killing of Abu Obeida, spokesman for Hamas's armed wing, during an operation in Gaza. He hailed a "perfect execution" carried out by the IDF and the Shin Bet.

title: Israel Kills 'Face of Hamas' in Gaza City Attack
description:
Abu Obeida was a steadfast voice of the resistance in Palestine. The red keffiyeh wearing firebrand represented Hamas' military wing for nearly two decades.

But no longer. Israeli airstrikes killed the Al-Qassam Brigades spokesperson in Gaza City, as the IDF continues preparations for its offensive in the Gaza Strip.

Hamas' leadership is now weaker than ever - as Israel readies itself for its next advance in the war, while showing no signs of stopping.

title: Abu Obeida Pamerkan Kesuksesan Al-Qassam saat Lawan Israel selama Seminggu, Kirim Rudal ke Tel Aviv
description:
Download aplikasi berita TribunX di Play Store atau App Store untuk dapatkan pengalaman baru

TRIBUN-VIDEO.COM - Juru Bicara Brigade Al-Qassam, Abu Ubaida, mengumumkan kesuksesan operasi mereka dalam melawan tentara Israel selama seminggu terakhir.

Dilansir dari Tribunnews.com pada Kamis (11/1/2024), pada Rabu (10/1/2024), Ubaida mengatakan Al-Qassam telah berhasil menghancurkan 42 kendaraan militer Israel.

Selain itu, lewat 52 operasi militer yang dilakukan, kelompok sayap Hamas ini telah menewaskan 22 tentara Israel dan puluhan lainnya tewas atau terluka.

Dikutip dari Al Mayadeen, Ubaida juga menambahkan Al-Qassam berhasil menjatuhkan sebuah pesawat pengintai Hermes 900.

Pihaknya juga menyita sebuah pesawat Skylark dan dua drone, serta menghancurkan markas komando lapangan, beserta ruangan-ruangannya.

Adapun, Al-Qassam, menurut Ubaida, menggunakan mortir dan rudal jarak pendek dalam melakukan operasinya.

Tak hanya berfokus memukul mundur pasukan Israel di Gaza, Al-Qassam juga melepaskan serangan rudal terkonsentrasi ke arah Tel Aviv dan sekitarnya.

Di hari yang sama, sebelum Ubaida menyampaikan pernyataannya, Juru Bicara Brigade Al-Quds, Abu Hamzah, juga bicara pencapaian mereka di Gaza.

Abu Hamzah menyebut, tentara Israel dan Perdana Menteri Benjamin Netanyahu mengalami kegagalan di wilayah kantong itu.

Ia mengatakan, kelompok sayap Jihad Islam Palestina (PIJ) tempatnya bernaung itu telah berhasil menembak jatuh sebuah pesawat intelijen Israel di atas Khan Younis.

Abu Hamzah mengklaim pihaknya akan merilis informasi lebih lanjut secepatnya.

Ia juga mengatakan, penargetan terhadap tentara Israel yang membarikade dirinya di sebuah rumah di Khan Younis.

Setelah pernyataannya, media militer Brigade Al-Quds menerbitkan rekaman yang mendokumentasikan penemuan mereka tersebut.

Hamzah mengatakan, peristiwa yang terjadi di medan perang "terlalu besar" untuk didokumentasikan oleh kamera pejuang perlawanan.

Di akhir pernyataannya, ia menekankan, "Tidak akan ada stabilitas bagi warga Israel selama perang terus berlanjut."

Adapun, sesaat setelah pernyataan Abu Hamzah, militer Israel mengumumkan satu perwira mereka tewas dan seorang lainnya terluka parah dalam pertempuran darat dengan Perlawanan Palestina di pusat Jalur Gaza.

Berdasarkan klausul "diizinkan untuk mempublikasikan", media militer Israel mengumumkan perwira yang tewas adalah seorang petugas medis di markas besar Divisi 99.

Dalam pertempuran yang sama, seorang prajurit di batalion cadangan 7220 juga terluka parah.

Dengan pengumuman ini, jumlah korban tewas tentara Israel telah mencapai 520 orang sejak operasi Banjir Al Aqsa Hamas (7/10/2023) lalu.

Sebanyak 180 di antaranya tewas sejak dimulainya pertempuran darat di Jalur Gaza.

(Tribun-Video.com/Tribunnews.com)

title: Israel Katz confirme l'Ã©limination d'Abu Obeida
IDF Recovers Body of Thai Hostage from Rafah as it Faces a Manpower Crunch; Greta and Aid Near Gaza
description:
The Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) have recovered the body of Nattapong Pinta, a Thai agricultural worker abducted during Hamas' October 7, 2023 attack on Kibbutz Nir Oz. His remains were found near Rafah in southern Gaza in a joint operation with Shin Bet. Pinta was the final Thai hostage confirmed dead; however, two other Thai nationals remain unaccounted for. Overall, 46 Thai nationals have been killed since the war began, many employed in agriculture due to a bilateral labor agreement between Israel and Thailand.

title: HAMAS Spokesperson Abu Obeida WARNS Netanyahu of More IDF Deaths | â€˜This Is Just the Beginningâ€™
description:
Hamas Warns 'More Captures Coming' After Killing 5 Israeli Soldiers In Gaza | Netanyahu Shaken
In a meticulously planned operation, Hamas forces have dealt a devastating blow to the IDF, raising critical questions about Israel's strategy in the ongoing war. This report details the attack and its significant fallout.

In a major escalation in the Israel-Gaza war, Hamas's military wing, the Al-Qassam Brigades, has claimed responsibility for a deadly ambush in Beit Hanoun, northern Gaza. The operation involved a planned IED blast that targeted Israeli Defense Forces (IDF), resulting in the deaths of five soldiers and injuring fourteen others. This incident represents a significant tactical victory for Hamas and a blow to Israel's military prestige. The fallen soldiers included four from the 97th Netzah Yehuda Battalion and one from the Northern Gaza Brigade, with the IDF officially naming Staff Sgt. Noam Musgadian and Sgt. Moshe Frech among the deceased.

Following the attack, Al-Qassam's spokesperson, Abu Obeida, released a defiant statement, warning of more Israeli losses to come. He declared the Beit Hanoun operation a "heavy blow" to Israel's ground capabilities and promised further captures of Israeli soldiers in future engagements. Obeida asserted that the resistance in Gaza remains strong and framed the ongoing conflict as a "war of attrition" that will continue to cost Israel both soldiers and international standing, calling the situation "Netanyahu's biggest mistake."

This attack occurred under complex circumstances. According to an i24 News report, the ambush was triggered when an IDF medical unit entered the area to evacuate soldiers wounded in a prior engagement. The incident's timing is also critical, as it coincides with indirect ceasefire talks being held in Qatar between Israeli and Hamas representatives. The event underscores the persistent challenge Israel faces in containing Hamas, even two years into the conflict, and adds immense pressure on Prime Minister Netanyahu's government. A report from RT News even claimed Netanyahu was furious upon hearing the news just before a dinner meeting with Donald Trump, highlighting the intense political pressure he is under.

title: Hamas' Abu Obaida In Afghanistan? Images From Taliban Military Parade Go Viral | Watch
description:
Images of a person mirroring Hamas' Al-Qassam Brigades spokesperson Abu Obaida from Taliban defence ministry event in Afghanistan have gone viral. The man in the images is resembles Abu Obaida who shot to prominence in the Arab world amid ongoing war between Israel and Palestine in Gaza. Watch the video for more.

Abu Obeida was the spokesman for the Palestinian resistance fighters. He worked for Hamas for more than two decades. He used to provide updates on the aggression in Gaza and the independence fighters from the battlefield. He used to highlight Hamas's statements. Now he himself has become the news. Abu Obeida, the spokesman for the military wing of Hamas, was killed in a joint operation by the IDF and the Israeli intelligence agency Shin Beit. His family also confirmed the news of his death.

title: Hamas' Abu Obaida's First Public Appearance In Gaza Since Oct. 7 Attack? Watch Viral Photo
description:
Hamas' al-Qassam Brigades spokesman Abu Obaida purportedly appeared in Gaza strip on Friday. Palestinian accounts on X have claimed that Obaida appeared in Gaza & met with the people. Hindustan times independently cannot verify the claim, date or location of the photo shared on X. Abu Obaida is the spokesman of Gaza-based hamas group's military wing - al-Qassam Brigades. Watch the video for more.

title: Who is Abu Obeida?
description:
Who exactly is Abu Obeida, the masked Hamas spokesman who rose to prominence after the Hamas-led surprise attack on Israel on 7 October? 

Heâ€™s a hero for many in the Arab world but his prominence has made him a target for the Israeli military and his high-ranking position in Hamas - a designated terrorist organisation by the US and UK - has resulted in his inclusion on Washington's sanctions list.

title: Abu Obaida assassination rumors "part of Israeli psychological war", says Hamas
description:
Security forces of the Palestinian resistance have cautioned the public against recent 'Israeli' claims suggesting that Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for Hamasâ€™s armed wing, had been assassinated in Gaza.

According to the resistance, these rumors are part of a deliberate 'Israeli' campaign designed to serve intelligence and psychological objectives.

The statement highlighted that 'Israeli' media is heavily controlled by the military and intelligence agencies, and nothing is published without prior security approval. Past incidents have shown that 'Israel' often spreads false reports about targeted leaders to manipulate their behavior, gather intelligence, and prepare for potential operations.

The resistance warned that such misinformation is part of a broader psychological warfare effort intended to destabilize internal morale and create confusion within Gaza.

Citizens were urged not to circulate these claims, emphasizing that these rumors are aimed at weakening public confidence and undermining the unity of the Palestinian front.

title: Hamas' Abu Obaida's 2021 Speech Shared By Palestinians Amid Release Of Hostages, Prisoners | Israel
description:
Amid celebrations in both Israel and Palestinian territories over the release of hostages and prisoners, Palestinians shared a clip from an old speech of Abu Obaida, the spokesperson of Hamas' military wing Al Qassam Brigades. Obaida is heard speaking on the Gilboa jailbreak of 2021. Meanwhile, Hamas released 24 hostages - both Israeli and foreigners - and Israel released 39 Palestinian prisoners from its jails. Watch the full video for more.

title: Abu Obaida delivers first speech since ceasefire
description:
"This could have been achieved a year ago if it suited Netanyahu."

Abu Obaida, the spokesman for Al-Qassam Brigades, Hamas' military wing, delivered a speech after the ceasefire went into effect in Gaza on Sunday morning.

In his address, Abu Obaida confirmed Hamas' commitment to the ceasefire and called on international mediators to ensure Israel abided by the agreement.

He also blamed Israel's government for delaying its agreement to a ceasefire for months, and thanked armed groups across the region for their solidarity with Gaza.

Lastly, he assured Palestinians in Gaza that this was a time for rebuilding and unity as they recover from the immense destruction of Israel's war on the strip and look to the future.

title: U.S.' Blinken Welcomed With Hamas' Abu Obeida Posters & 'Murderer' Slogans In Turkey | Gaza War
description:
Massive pro-Palestine protests erupted in the Turkish capital, Ankara, against US Secretary of State Anthony Blinken's visit amid Israel's relentless bombardment in the Gaza Strip. Blinken met Turkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan after a frantic weekend of travel that took him from Israel to Jordan, the occupied West Bank, Cyprus, and Iraq to build support for the Biden administrationâ€™s proposal for â€œhumanitarian pausesâ€ to Israelâ€™s relentless military campaign in Gaza. The top U.S. diplomat was also not received by the Turkish foreign minister at the airport in clear messaging by Ankara. Watch this video to know more.

title: Full Speech: Hamasâ€™ Abu Obeida Breaks Silence After 4 Months | Sends CHILLING Warning To Israel
description:
Hamasâ€™ military wing spokesperson, Abu Obeida, has re-emerged after four months of silence with a fiery televised address. Speaking for the first time since Israel renewed its military offensive in Gaza in March, Obeida condemned the Arab world's silence over the suffering in Gaza and accused them of betraying the Palestinian cause. His harsh words targeted not just Israel, but the Arab regimes he labelled as complicit.

Obeida also outlined Hamas' evolving battle strategy, revealing counter-operations to Israelâ€™s â€œGideonâ€™s Chariots.â€ The speech, filled with warnings and a tone of defiance, has stunned many, especially coming amid rising tensions between Israel and Syria. His appearance comes as a symbolic message â€” Hamas is neither broken nor backing down. Watch the full speech to understand whatâ€™s next in this escalating conflict.

title: Abu Obeida Mengeklaim Ingin Jadikan Invasi di Gaza Palestina sebagai 'Kutukan'
description:
VP : Riskiani NDM

TRIBUNJATIM.COM - Kelompok militan Hamas  bersumpah akan menjadikan invasi di Gaza Palestina sebagai 'kutukan' bagi Israel.

Demikian disampaikan juru bicara Hamas, Abu Obeida dalam keterangannya pada Kamis (2/11).

Abu Obeida memperingatkan operasi darat Israel yang berkelanjutan di Jalur Gaza akan menimbulkan konsekuensi bencana bagi Israel.

Ia menegaskan banyak tentara Israel akan tewas dan kembali ke dalam kantong mayat.

Diketahui, lebih dari 9.000 warga Palestina tewas dibunuh pasukan Zionis dalam serangan daratnya di Gaza.

Sejauh ini IDF mengkonfirmasi 17 tentaranya tewas dalam pertempurannya dengan Hamas.

Pernyataan Abu Obeida muncul ketika IDF mengklaim telah mengepung Gaza di bagian utara.

Juru bicara IDF Daniel Hagari, mengatakan pengepungan tersebut berada di pusat organisasi Hamas.

Militer Israel juga mengesampingkan gagasan gencatan senjata dalam waktu dekat.

Meski demikian, Israel telah menghadapi tekanan yang semakin besar dari PBB dan kelompok-kelompok kemanusiaan untuk melakukan gencatan senjata.

title: Hamas is still committed to truce says Qassam Brigades spokesperson
description:
Abu Obaida, the spokesperson for the Qassam Brigades - Hamas's military wing - said on Thursday that should Israel return to war in Gaza, it will risk the lives of the remaining living captives.

In a 12-minute video posted to Telegram, Abu Obeida said that Hamas says is still committed to abiding by a ceasefire deal.

"Despite all the enemy's attempts at evasion, lies and deception, we preferred and still prefer to adhere to the agreement in order to spare the blood of our people," he added.

title: TANPA AMPUN! HAMAS HANCURKAN 160 KENDARAAN CANGGIH ISRAEL, ABU OBEIDA: PENGHANCURAN TOTAL!
description:
VP: Bimayur

TRIBUNJATIM.COM -Juru bicara Brigade Al Qassam Abu Obeida mengumumkan kehancuran besar-besaran yang dilakukan oleh pasukannya.

Ia mengatakan bahwa pasukan telah menghancurkan lebih dari 160 kendaraan militer Israel selama invasi darat.

Penghancuran itu termasuk lebih dari 25 unit tank selama 48 jam terakhir.

Hal itu diungkapkan oleh Abu Obeida dalam hari ke tiga puluh enam pertempuran Israel dan Hamas yang dirilis pada Minggu (12/11/2023).

Obeida mengatakan bahwa tank-tank Israel menghadapi perlawanan sengit dan bentrokan hebat.

Sehingga memaksa pasukan Israel mundur dan mengubah arah serangan mereka.

Abu Obeida juga mengumumkan bahwa lebih dari 25 kendaraan militer hancur seluruhnya atau sebagian dalam serangan Perlawanan dalam 48 jam terakhir saja.

Sehingga total sudah ada lebih dari 160 tank yang dihancurkan sejak invasi darat di Gaza.

Pernyataan tersebut diikuti dengan sebuah video, yang dirilis oleh Brigade Al-Qassam, yang menunjukkan penargetan tank Israel dengan pertahanan anti-artileri rakitan.

Abu Obeida mengakui bahwa kekuatan dalam perang saat ini memang tidak seimbang.

Hal ini pun menurutnya akan menakutkan dan mengerikan bagi pasukan yang paling kuat di kawasan tersebut.

Namun di saat bersamaan, Pasukan Israel mengumumkan pembunuhan seorang perwira dan empat tentara di Jalur Gaza.

Menyusul pengumuman baru-baru ini yang mencatat 5 kematian baru di Jalur Gaza.

Israel mengklaim bahwa jumlah korban tewas tentara di Gaza adalah 43 orang sejak dimulainya invasi darat.
